tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Surgical Tooth Extraction,
review:
********* ** *** ** *** **** ******** **** ******** I had delayed my simple cavity filling for years because of the fear of sitting on the dental chair which ultimately ended in a root canal. I googled for good dentists in and around malad and came across Dr. Rushad and I am so relieved and happy to have found him. A truly humble, honest, patient and soft spoken doctor who excels in his work. I thank him and his entire team from the bottom of my heart for being so patient with me and making my entire dental experience so comfortable and painless.
I also got 2 of my wisdom tooth extracted which was a surgical process. I must say that he and his co-doctor took all the efforts and care to ensure that it doesn't pain at all and it didn't.
Everytime he treats you, he does a regular follow up to check if there is any pain or discomfort after the treatment which gives you such a warm and comforting feeling.
Thank you Dr. Nariman for bearing me, being so patient with me and giving the best dental treatment.
I will highly recommend him for every dental treatment.
Wish you all the very best!!
reply_text: Thank you so much for a detailed feedback...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My experience with Dr. Rushad Nariman has been really a memorable one as he has given my teeth a new lease of life which I will never forget. I was having multiple problems in my teeth having cavities in either side, foods were getting stuck up giving a lot of inconvenience and many a times lot of pain in my teeth. I had consulted other doctors as well before coming to Dr. Rushad. What I perceived from all these meetings that I will have to go for full mouth rehabilitation. I talked to Dr. Rushad on this line. He helped me understand all the scenarios. Truly speaking, I was a little bit apprehensive also as a fair amount of money was required for this treatment. Anyway, I could prepare myself for this treatment. One more thing, I had to stick to a deadline for this procedure to be completed on or before. At the first instance, Dr. Rushad told me that this is not possible within the timeline I had given. But after 2 or 3 days, he called me in the evening and told he will try his best and really he tried his best and could finish everything perfectly on time. Now, I am quite happy that now I can chew, eat and of course show my beautiful teeth with perfect smile. God bless him as he has really rendered his services with perfect professionalism and personal touch.
reply_text: Thank you so much for such a detailed feedback. Your kind words help us strive towards excellence

review:
Hi, I removed my wisdom tooth from Dr. Nariman. I must say he took all the efforts and care so that it doesn't pain at all and it didn't. He gave me medicines for 3 days but I was feeling good after 2 days only. He would not rush even if other patients are waiting. He gives all the time required for the patient to feel comfortable. His treatment is the best as compared to all the dentists I have met till date. After this, I also did my teeth cleaning from him which was again a very good experience. 

My mother got her dentures done from him. He explained the process in detail initially which not all doctors do in so much of detail. He then successfully completed the treatment as per the plan given by him. The dentures are fitted very nicely and my mother has no pain. He does regular follow up to ask about any other pain / skin issues that happens due to the dentures. He tells us to visit him and not bear any pain. His patients don't have to wait because he always reaches his clinic before the appointment time. 

Seeing this, even my bua went to her for her dentures which were not fixing properly (given and prepared by other dentist). And even she is happy with his treatment and with the way he treats his patients.
 
A big Thank you to Dr. Nariman for giving us *** **** dental treatment. May god bless you and you become the most successful Dentist.

I highly recommend him for every dental treatment.
reply_text: Thank so much shruti for your kind words. We are blessed to treat your entire family

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience with Dr. Rushad Nariman was very good. With my set of teeth it was very difficult for any doctor to treat them and fix two permanent tooth. But Dr. Rushad took the step very easily. He has a very light hand and with his easy and understanding nature I could not feel any much pain throughout my dental treatment. He explained each and every step and problem along with the solution. It was a great experience and I am very happy with the result. I wish to continue under his consultation in future too. Thank you very much doctor.  Stay blessed.
reply_text: Thank you...you were a very co operative patient

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Rushad for my implant prosthesis and the positive experience makes me write this review. Dr Rushad explained to me in depth about the implant procedure and the possible outcomes. His honest yet friendly approach made me calm throughout the procedure. He made sure there was follow up and that xrays were taken on recall to make sure the implant was fine. The thorough care and approach towards my dental health definitely makes him my go-to-dentist. I highly recommend Dr Rushad for all your dental concerns and treatment.
reply_text: Thank you so much Karishma for your generous words

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Rushad Nariman treated my mom's dental pain caused by two older root canal fillings done by another dentist. He quickly diagnosed the problem and explained what his plan of action would be: to re-do the root canal. Dr. Nariman made sure that my mom, who was in severe pain, felt comfortable for the procedure. Mom was very satisfied with the experience and healed within days. Dr. Nariman also provided the best caps for the affected teeth as quickly as possible. His work is so impeccable that the caps looks just like the real adjacent tooth. My mom is now pain-free and flashes a confident smile, all thanks to Dr. Nariman.
reply_text: Thank you for the detailed experience rini...Happy to see you and your mom satisfied with the treatment

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Deep Cleaning,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Rushad since past 5 years for all my dental related issues and I trust him completely without a doubt. Recently I got my wisdom teeth extraction from him, it went very smooth and I was perfectly fine within 2 to 3 days. I would recommend everyone to visit his clinic for any type of dental treatments.
reply_text: Thank you heta for your kind words...

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I got my dental crowns done at Dr Narimans clinic.  He was very gentle during the treatment, very soft spoken and explained me the whole procedure and treatment options thoroughly.  Would definitely recommend family and friends to him for dental treatment.
reply_text: Thank you so much for showing trust in us by travelling all the way from vapi to get your treatment done

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a missing tooth since a very long time. I was scared to visit any dentist to add my tooth which was removed in childhood. Dr. Narimans assurance treatment  explanation helped me take this bold decision of going in for implant fixation procedure. I am really satisfied with the work and finally got my tooth back
reply_text: Thank you....you were a brave and cooperative patient....

context: Periodontal Flap Surgery,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Examinations,
review:
Dr Rushad is very kind and patient and explained the process very well. In my first visit only I felt so comfortable that I decided to get my flap surgery and tooth implants done with him even though I had seen other doctors. 
My surgery for flap took almost 4 sittings and then again implants took 2-4 sittings. Doc was extremely good and made sure I was comfortable and kept checking even after I left the clinic. Highly recommend him to one and all.
reply_text: Thank you so much monaz. You were a very cooperating patient

review: I had such a good and pleasant experience with dr rushad. He is an amazing doctor who explains everything in detail before starting any procedure. I got a few ceramic caps and implants done from him and the entire treatment was absolutely painless. I would recommend everyone who is scared of dentists to please visit him once. I guarantee that your thinking will change!
reply_text: Thank you snehal for your kind words ....really appreciate the fact that you are totally satisfied with our treatment
